import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Api from '../API' import { endPoints } from '../API/Endpoint' import ProductCard from './ProductCard' const Homepagedata = ({ data }) => { const [Sellingdata, SetSellingdata] = useState() useEffect(() => { const requestpayload = { block_name: data.block_name, id: data.id } Api.Post(endPoints.GET_HOME_PAGE_DATA, requestpayload).then(res => { SetSellingdata(res.data.data) }) }) console.log(Sellingdata) return (<>

See what's selling

View All
) } export default Homepagedata
